description:
A free, lightweight and simple to use .NET tool for manipulating SQL Server databases. You're gonna love it.

For more information, visit:
http://www.getdbbroker.com/Home/GettingStarted
summary:
A fast and lightweight tool to simplify data manipulation in SQL Server databases via Object/Relational Mapping-ORM.
DBBroker has a contextual data access and is SQL oriented. Not Linq. Not HQL.
title: DBBroker
